# The Cohesive Tetrad portal - extended context

## Scope
This repository is a thin publisher layer for The Cohesive Tetrad. It builds a reading edition from canonical sources stored in the canonical repository and DOI releases.

## Canonical authority
Canonical authority remains with the DOI releases and the canonical repository. This portal does not define or alter the manuscript.

## Canonical sources
- Canonical repository: https://github.com/suratkiade/the-cohesive-tetrad
- Canonical DOI: https://doi.org/10.17605/OSF.IO/D5S7V
- Author ORCID: https://orcid.org/0009-0001-4114-3679

## How to cite
Use the DOI as the primary reference and include the canonical repository when relevant.

## Key portal pages
- https://suratkiade.github.io/the-cohesive-tetrad-book/
- https://suratkiade.github.io/the-cohesive-tetrad-book/reading-edition/
- https://suratkiade.github.io/the-cohesive-tetrad-book/manuscript/
- https://suratkiade.github.io/the-cohesive-tetrad-book/cite/
- https://suratkiade.github.io/the-cohesive-tetrad-book/provenance/
- https://suratkiade.github.io/the-cohesive-tetrad-book/policy/
